title: Bill Withers - Menagerie
description:
Bill Withers (born July 4, 1938) is an African-American vocalist and songwriter who performed and recorded from 1970 until 1985. Some of his best-known songs are "Ain't No Sunshine," "Use Me," "Lovely Day," "Lean on Me", "Grandma's Hands", and "Just the Two of Us".

Track List -


	1.	Lovely Day  
	2.	I Want to Spend the Night  
	3.	Lovely Night For Dancing
	4.	Then You Smile at Me
	5.	She Wants to (Get on Down)
	6.	It Ain't Because of Me Baby
	7.	Tender Things
	8.	Wintertime
	9.	Let Me Be the One You Need  
	10.	Rosie - (previously unreleased)
	11.	Lovely Night For Dancing - (single version)
	12.	Let Me Be the One You Need - (instrumental mix)
